name: aluminium, ingot, primary, import from unspecified | aluminium, primary, ingot | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22938/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of primary aluminium from other regions (US and  imported form the rest of the world)  used in North America. This value is valid for 2016 and includes all other imports, independently whether used within the importing region, or re-exported. AA and AAC statistics

This activity represents the point of "handing over" the primary aluminium ingot from one country to the other at the border.
